content:
Getting an issue on one of the scenario submissions...

b1_toc_inp_sample1_v14

Screen-Shot-2020-10-07-at-4.52.55-PM.png Screen-Shot-2020-10-07-at-4.52.43-PM.png

The scenario is claiming to require 214078 rxnorm, but, the test is claiming that isn't in the value set.

I'll try to email siteenv team, but, I seemed to get a better response here last time, so, here it is. Let me know if I am missing something else, or if this is a validator bug.

The entry as well:

<substanceAdministration classCode="SBADM" moodCode="EVN">
<templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.16" extension="2014-06-09"/>
<templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.16"/>
<id extension="111" root="1.2.840.114398.1.121569165829158052341527818594105.999.0.1"/>
<text>
<reference value="#Med111"/>
</text>
<statusCode code="completed"/>
<effectiveTime xsi:type="IVL_TS">
<low value="20150622"/>
<high value="20150630"/>
</effectiveTime>
<doseQuantity value="0"/>
<consumable>
<manufacturedProduct classCode="MANU">
<templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.23"/>
<templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.23" extension="2014-06-09"/>
<id extension="111" root="1.2.840.114398.1.121569165829158052341527818594105.999.0.2"/>
<manufacturedMaterial>
<code code="214078" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.88" displayName="Vantin 200 mg tablet">
<originalText>
<reference value="#Med111"/>
</originalText>
</code>
<!-- FDB ids:259993/9043 -->
</manufacturedMaterial>
</manufacturedProduct>
</consumable>
</substanceAdministration>
</entry>
